title: Rune pages deleted multiple times and one time all skins deselected
body:
I saw a 7 month old report about this. It's still an issue. Two times all rune pages deleted on my main. One time today on a smurf. One time every single skin on my main was deselected I have over 100 skins on that account. I know back in team builder you couldn't use team builder because it ruined your skin selection so I stopped using it. Now however you can't even play arams or ranked without it randomly happening. I am not 100% sure but it seems like your summoner spells are also reset to default sometimes when this happens. It didn't look like it happened today though but I am fairly sure it happened last time.

Please fix this! It's more than a minor inconvenience when you have 20 rune pages and spent hours researching optimal runes for a variety of champions.

I am not posting from the account it happened on in case you actually care about fixing this.

replies.body: Not sure if this is related but we were having issues with the service that stores settings. Those issues have been resolved. Let us know if you are still running into this.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot BlueMonday,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=mUAaZ6v2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-12-07T21:24:42.940+0000)
>
> Not sure if this is related but we were having issues with the service that stores settings. Those issues have been resolved. Let us know if you are still running into this.

My summoners were reset last game, as well as my runes. This happened like ~30 mins ago, not major, but p annoying.

> [{quoted}](name=Meeptheking,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=mUAaZ6v2,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-12-07T22:04:20.381+0000)
>
> My summoners were reset last game, as well as my runes. This happened like ~30 mins ago, not major, but p annoying.

Still happening if you set them or is it all good now?
Right before Clash, all my items sets were deleted. And when I logged on to my another account EUW, it had all rune pages deleted.
